author: vors
body:
Repro

```
> rm .\build\ -Force
> .\build.FullCLR.ps1 -cmakeGenerator "Visual Studio 14 2015"

...
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\link.exe /ERRORREPORT:QUEUE /OUT:"D:\dev\PowerShell\build\Release\powershell.exe
  " /INCREMENTAL:NO /NOLOGO /LIBPATH:"D:/dev/PowerShell/src/powershell-native/../../src/monad/monad/nttargets/assemblies/nativemsh/pwrshcommo
  n" /LIBPATH:"D:/dev/PowerShell/src/powershell-native/../../src/monad/monad/nttargets/assemblies/nativemsh/pwrshcommon/Release" kernel32.lib
   user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib mscoree.lib MUILoad.lib kernel32.l
  ib msxml6.lib /MANIFEST /MANIFESTUAC:"level='asInvoker' uiAccess='false'" /manifest:embed /PDB:"D:/dev/PowerShell/build/Release/powershell.
  pdb" /SUBSYSTEM:CONSOLE /TLBID:1 /DYNAMICBASE /NXCOMPAT /IMPLIB:"D:/dev/PowerShell/build/Release/powershell.lib" /MACHINE:X86 /SAFESEH  /ma
  chine:X86 powershell.dir\Release\ConfigFileReader.obj
  powershell.dir\Release\pwrshcommon.obj
  powershell.dir\Release\WinSystemCallFacade.obj
  powershell.dir\Release\MainEntry.obj
MUILoad.lib(muiload.obj) : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol __vsnwprintf referenced in function "long __stdcall StringVPrintfWorkerW
(unsigned short *,unsigned int,unsigned int *,unsigned short const *,char *)" (?StringVPrintfWorkerW@@YGJPAGIPAIPBGPAD@Z) [D:\dev\PowerShell\
build\powershell.vcxproj]
D:\dev\PowerShell\build\Release\powershell.exe : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals [D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxproj]
Done Building Project "D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxproj" (default targets) -- FAILED.


Build FAILED.

"D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
(ClCompile target) ->
  D:\dev\PowerShell\src\monad\monad\nttargets\assemblies\nativemsh\pwrshcommon\pwrshcommon.cpp(1550): warning C4996: 'CorBindToRuntimeEx': Th
is API has been deprecated. Refer to http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143720 for more details. [D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxp
roj]
  D:\dev\PowerShell\src\monad\monad\nttargets\assemblies\nativemsh\pwrshcommon\WinSystemCallFacade.cpp(68): warning C4996: '_wfopen': This fu
nction or variable may be unsafe. Consider using _wfopen_s instead. To disable deprecation, use _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS. See online help for
details. [D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxproj]


"D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
(Link target) ->
  MUILoad.lib(muiload.obj) : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol __vsnwprintf referenced in function "long __stdcall StringVPrintfWorke
rW(unsigned short *,unsigned int,unsigned int *,unsigned short const *,char *)" (?StringVPrintfWorkerW@@YGJPAGIPAIPBGPAD@Z) [D:\dev\PowerShel
l\build\powershell.vcxproj]
  D:\dev\PowerShell\build\Release\powershell.exe : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals [D:\dev\PowerShell\build\powershell.vcxproj]

    2 Error(s)
```

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Would love this fixed at some point :smile:

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Also VC++ is available as nuget package, maybe we can remove VS dependency completely https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2016/02/16/try-out-the-latest-c-compiler-toolset-without-waiting-for-the-next-update-of-visual-studio/

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
~~Hey hey that would be awesome. I can give it a go.~~

As we found out in the hackathon, the package is not viable for compiling.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: I cannot consume their nuget packages to try them out. @lzybkr pointed out that we really don't want to use this beta builds anyway. So I solved the problem with moving to VS 2015.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors I'm trying to build with VS 2015; you just aid it worked, but I'm getting the same error as reported. Did you mean 2013?

title: Building native powershell.exe is failing in VS 2015
